薬漬け: (くすりづけ) - overprescription; overmedication; drug dependence
薬煉: (くすね) - boiled pine pitch and oil (traditionally used as a glue in archery, etc.)
薬物不法所持: (やくぶつふほうしょじ) - drug possession
薬物中毒: (やくぶつちゅうどく) - medicinal poisoning/chemical poisoning/drug poisoning; drug addiction
薬物乱用: (やくぶつらんよう) - drug abuse
薬物去勢: (やくぶつきょせい) - chemical castration
薬物四法: (やくぶつよんぽう) - the four drug-control laws of Japan
薬物投与: (やくぶつとうよ) - drug administration; giving of a drug; medication
薬物治療: (やくぶつちりょう) - drug therapy
薬物統制: (やくぶつとうせい) - drug control
薬玉: (くすだま) - ornamental ball-shaped scent bag; decorative paper ball (for festive occasions)
薬玉詰草: (クスダマツメクサ) - hop trefoil (Trifolium campestre); low hop clover
薬用植物: (やくようしょくぶつ) - medicinal plants or herbs
薬用石鹸: (やくようせっけん) - medicinal soap
薬用酒: (やくようしゅ) - alcoholic beverage for medicinal purposes
薬石: (やくせき) - various medicines/medical treatment; supper in a Zen temple/rice porridge served for supper in a Zen temple
薬石効なく: (やくせきこうなく) - no medical treatment having proved effective
薬石効無く: (やくせきこうなく) - no medical treatment having proved effective
薬石無効: (やくせきむこう) - (yoji) neither medicines nor medical care having little effect on a patient
薬禍: (やっか) - harmful side effects of a medicine or drug
薬科大学: (やっかだいがく) - pharmaceutical college; college of pharmacy
薬籠中の物: (やくろうちゅうのもの) - complete mastery of or over; at one's beck and call
薬練: (くすね) - boiled pine pitch and oil (traditionally used as a glue in archery, etc.)
薬罐をかける: (やかんをかける) - to put a kettle on (the stove)
薬罐を掛ける: (やかんをかける) - to put a kettle on (the stove)
薬膳: (やくぜん) - medicinal cooking (based on traditional Chinese medicine)
薬草療法: (やくそうりょうほう) - herbal therapy
薬酒: (やくしゅ) - alcoholic beverage for medicinal purposes
薬食い: (くすりぐい) - winter-time practice of eating meat of animals such as boar and deer to ward off cold
薬餌療法: (やくじりょうほう) - treatment by medicine and diet
薮をつついて蛇を出す: (やぶをつついてへびをだす) - to stir up trouble for oneself; to scare out a snake by poking at the brush
薮入り: (やぶいり) - holiday granted to servants on the 16th of the first and seventh months
薮蚊: (ヤブカ) - aedine mosquito (any mosquito of genus Aedes, characterized by stripes)
薮蛇: (やぶへび) - unnecessary trouble brought upon oneself; stirring up a hornet's nest
薮蛇になる: (やぶへびになる) - you'll only make work for yourself; to stir up a hornet's nest; to put one's foot in one's mouth
薮蛇に成る: (やぶへびになる) - you'll only make work for yourself; to stir up a hornet's nest; to put one's foot in one's mouth
薯蕷粥: (いもがゆ) - rice gruel with diced sweet potatoes; gruel with ivy broth and finely minced Japanese yam served at large Imperial banquets
薹が立つ: (とうがたつ) - to become hard and fibrous; to go to seed; to have passed one's prime; to have lost the first bloom of one's youth
藁しべ: (わらしべ) - central stalk of a dried rice plant
藁で束ねても男は男: (わらでたばねてもおとこはおとこ) - a man is still a man even if his hair is tied with straw; a man is still a man even if he's poor
藁にもすがる: (わらにもすがる) - to grasp at straws; to resort to desperate measures
藁にもすがる思いで: (わらにもすがるおもいで) - hoping against hope; desperately hoping; as a last hope
藁にも縋る: (わらにもすがる) - to grasp at straws; to resort to desperate measures
藁にも縋る思いで: (わらにもすがるおもいで) - hoping against hope; desperately hoping; as a last hope
藁をもすがる: (わらをもすがる) - (incorrect variant of 藁にもすがる)  to grasp at straws; to resort to desperate measures
藁人形: (わらにんぎょう) - straw doll or figure; straw effigy
藁仕事: (わらしごと) - making things out of straw (winter work for farmers)
藁塚: (わらづか) - mound of straw; pile of straw
